name: naughtiness
content:
naughtiness noun [U]
(BAD BEHAVIOUR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
bad behaviour, when someone does not do what they are told to do: Kids learn from a young age that naughtiness gets immediate attention. She wins hearts with a mixture of naughtiness and sweetness.
More examplesFewer examplesThe children know that naughtiness is punished.Most of his friendships are based on shared silliness or naughtiness.Her feelings of abandonment were often mistaken for naughtiness.

(SEXUAL)
behaviour or comments that involve or suggest sex: They derived schoolboy amusement from the supposed naughtiness of her novels. See
naughty
